title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can successfully login with valid email and password and receive a valid JWT token.

steps.description: Navigate to the login API endpoint.
Submit valid email and password via POST /api/v1/auth/login.
Verify HTTP status 200 is returned.
Check response contains status 'success', a valid JWT token, and user object.

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify the system denies login when submitting incorrect email or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login API endpoint.
Submit invalid email or password via POST /api/v1/auth/login.
Verify HTTP status 401 or appropriate error code is returned.
Check response contains an error message indicating invalid credentials.

title: JWT Token Validation and Session Management
description: Test that after login, the issued JWT token allows access to protected routes and expires appropriately.

steps.description: Obtain JWT token via successful login.
Access a protected API endpoint with the token in Authorization header.
Verify access is granted with status 200.
Simulate token expiration or tampering.
Attempt to access the protected endpoint with expired or invalid token.
Verify access is denied with 401 Unauthorized.

title: Create New Partner with Valid Data
description: Verify the system allows creation of a new partner with all required fields valid and correctly stores it.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/partners with valid name, type, cpfCnpj, email, and phone.
Verify HTTP status 201 Created or 200 OK.
Confirm the partner data is returned with an assigned identifier.
Retrieve partner list and verify the new partner is included.

title: Create Partner with Missing Mandatory Fields
description: Verify that attempting to create a partner without required fields returns a validation error.

steps.description: Submit POST request to /api/v1/partners with missing or empty 'name' or 'type'.
Verify HTTP 400 Bad Request is returned.
Confirm error message details missing required fields.

title: List Partners with Pagination and Filtering
description: Verify partner list endpoint supports paging and filtering by type correctly.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/v1/partners with page=1, limit=10, and type filter set to 'VENDOR'.
Verify response status 200 and contains up to 10 partners all with type 'VENDOR'.
Repeat with page=2 and verify different set of results or empty list if none.

title: Register New Cattle Purchase with Valid Data
description: Verify registering a cattle purchase with valid vendor, payer account, animal counts, weights, and price calculates and stores total amount correctly.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/v1/cattle-purchases with valid vendorId, payerAccountId, totalAnimals, totalWeight, pricePerKg.
Verify HTTP 201 Created or 200 OK returned.
Check returned totalAmount equals totalWeight multiplied by pricePerKg.

title: Register Cattle Purchase Error on Negative Values
description: Verify that negative values for animals, weight, or price are rejected with validation errors.

steps.description: Send POST /api/v1/cattle-purchases with totalAnimals=-5 or totalWeight=-100.
Verify HTTP 400 Bad Request with relevant validation error.

title: Record New Expense with Valid Inputs
description: Verify financial expense records are created properly with categorization, description, amount, and due date.

steps.description: POST /api/v1/expenses with valid category, description, totalAmount, dueDate.
Confirm HTTP 201 Created or 200 OK.
Verify the new expense is retrievable from GET /api/v1/expenses.

title: Record Expense with Invalid Amount
description: Check the system rejects expenses with zero or negative amounts.

steps.description: POST /api/v1/expenses with totalAmount=0 or -50.
Verify HTTP 400 Bad Request with validation error.

title: Create New Pen with Capacity Constraints
description: Test that a new pen can be created, and its capacity is enforced during animal allocations.

steps.description: POST /api/v1/pens to create a pen with defined maximum capacity.
Confirm pen creation success response.
Attempt to allocate animals beyond capacity to the pen.
Verify system prevents over-allocation with error message.

title: Manage Sales Pipeline Using Kanban Board
description: Verify sales records can be created, listed, and manipulated to reflect status changes on the Kanban sales pipeline.

steps.description: POST /api/v1/sale-records to register new sale including status.
Verify response confirms registration.
GET /api/v1/sale-records and ensure new sale is present.
Simulate status change of a sale (e.g., 'Negotiation' -> 'Closed').
Confirm the status updates and reflects in subsequent GET calls.

title: Record Veterinary Intervention
description: Test that health officers can successfully log vaccination, medication, and other interventions with details.

steps.description: POST /api/v1/interventions with valid intervention data (type, date, animals involved).
Verify intervention is created and retrievable.

title: Validation on Intervention Data Input
description: Check that incomplete or invalid intervention data submissions are rejected with proper errors.

steps.description: POST /api/v1/interventions with missing mandatory fields or invalid dates.
Verify HTTP 400 with validation error.

title: Create and Retrieve Calendar Events
description: Ensure farm activities can be scheduled, stored, and retrieved via integrated calendar with reminders.

steps.description: POST /api/v1/calendar-events with valid event details including date and description.
Verify event creation success.
GET /api/v1/calendar-events to verify event presence.
Confirm event data matches input.

title: System Health Check Endpoint
description: Verify that the /health endpoint returns system and database health status.

steps.description: Send GET request to /health endpoint.
Validate HTTP 200 OK and status indicating healthy system and DB connections.

title: Data Protection and LGPD Compliance Testing
description: Verify encryption is applied to sensitive data, API requests validate input properly, and audit logs are generated for sensitive operations.

steps.description: Create or update user and partner data containing PII.
Check in database that sensitive fields are encrypted.
Attempt to submit malformed or malicious input.
Verify input validation rejects request.
Check audit logs for the recorded changes.
Confirm audit logs contain timestamp, user id, action description.

title: Performance: API Response Time Under 500ms
description: Measure key API endpoints response times under typical and peak loads to verify they are under 500 milliseconds.

steps.description: Send multiple concurrent GET and POST requests to core endpoints (auth/login, partners, purchases, financial, sales).
Verify response times consistently under 500 milliseconds.

title: UI Load Time Under 2 Seconds
description: Test that the web-based UI loads completely within 2 seconds on standardized network and device conditions.

steps.description: Open the main web app in browser under controlled network throttling.
Measure and confirm full UI load time is less than 2 seconds.

title: Test Data API for Cleanup and Token Generation
description: Validate the test data API endpoints to obtain test tokens and clean test data from the system.

steps.description: GET /api/v1/test-data/auth-token to receive test JWT token.
Check token format and validity.
DELETE /api/v1/test-data/cleanup to clean up test data.
Verify successful deletion response.
